alarm.title: Alarm
alarm.description: Devices which contain an alarm, eg. sensors, contact, fire, smoke, CO, etc.

blinds.title: Rolladen
blinds.description: Rolladen, sowohl horizontal als auch vertikal.

button.title: Taste
button.description: Tasten und andere Elemente, die keinen Zustand haben.

coffeemachine.title: Kaffemaschine
coffeemachine.description: coffeemakers or coffee machines are cooking appliances used to brew coffee.

curtain.title: Vorhänge
curtain.description: electronic curtains which will move the material sideways along a rail.

doorbell.title: Türklingel
doorbell.description: doorbells, and device which announce when a button is pressed.

garagedoor.title: Garagentor
garagedoor.description: garage doors as well as other automatic doors and gates.

heater.title: Heizung
heater.description: heaters and other devices which warm your home.

homeenergymonitor.title: Home Energy Monitor
homeenergymonitor.description: Devices that monitor a house's energy usage.

kettle.title: Wasserkocher
kettle.description: Kettles and other devices that can heat water.

light.title: Lampe
light.description: an illuminating agent or source, lights, globes, lamps, etc.

other.title: Andere
other.description: Geräte, die nicht in andere Geräteklassen passen.

relay.title: Relais
relay.description: Relais, die mit anderen Geräten verbunden sind.

remote.title: Fernbedienung
remote.description:
TV, blinds, remote control, etc. All
types of remote controls. "

sensor.title: Sensor
sensor.description: contact, motion, fire, CO  or any type of sensor. As well as alarms!

speaker.title: Lautsprecher
speaker.description: devices that can play audio, such as music.

thermostat.title: Thermostat
thermostat.description: Thermostate, entweder für das gesamte Heim oder pro Heizung

vacuumcleaner.title: Staubsauger
vacuumcleaner.description: automated devices which clean floors on demand.

onoff.title: Angeschaltet
onoff.description: Ob ein Gerät ein- oder ausgeschaltet ist.

dim.title: Dimm-Niveau
dim.description: Dims level of a device as a percentage of its full value

light_temperature.title: Farbtemperatur
light_temperature.description: The white light temperature warm to cold as a decimal

vacuumcleaner_state.title: Staubsauger-Status
vacuumcleaner_state.description: The state of a a vacuum cleaner, either it is cleaning, spot cleaning, docked, charging or stopped

thermostat_mode.title: Modus des Thermostates
thermostat_mode.description: Mode of the thermostat, either it is set to auto, heat, cool or off.

target_temperature.title: Ziel-Temperatur
target_temperature.description: Set the temperature which a device should target

alarm_contact.title: Kontakt-Alarm
alarm_contact.description: Alarms when a Contact sensor is severed, e.g. when window or door is opened

alarm_co.title: CO-Alarm
alarm_co.description: Alarme, wenn gefährliche CO-Werte erkannt wurden

alarm_co2.title: CO2-Alarm
alarm_co2.description: Alarme, wenn gefährliche CO2-Werte erkannt wurden

alarm_heat.title: Hitze-Alarm
alarm_heat.description: Alarme, wenn extreme Hitze erkannt wurde

alarm_battery.title: Batterie-Alarm
alarm_battery.description: Alarms when there is a battery warning, generally low battery

homealarm_state.title: Heim-Alarm-Status
homealarm_state.description: Switch between armed, disarmed and partially armed

locked.title: Verriegelt
locked.description: True, wenn das Schloss verriegelt ist

lock_mode.title: Schloss-Modus
lock_mode.description: Switch between Always locked, always unlocked and locked until unlocked modes

windowcoverings_state.title: Window Coverings State
windowcoverings_state.description: Whether a window cover is up, down or idle

windowcoverings_set.title: Window Coverings Set
windowcoverings_set.description: Die Position der Jalousien setzen. 0% ist geschlossen, 100% ist offen

speaker_playing.title: Speaker Playing
speaker_playing.description: What the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_repeat.title: Speaker Repeat
speaker_repeat.description: Set the repeat type, none, track or playlist.

speaker_artist.title: Speaker Artist
speaker_artist.description: Which artist the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_album.title: Speaker Album
speaker_album.description: Which album the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_track.title: Speaker Track
speaker_track.description: Which track the speaker is currently playing.

speaker_duration.title: Speaker Duration
speaker_duration.description: Which duration of the current item.
